mapper.select: select * from friends where id=#{id} and friend=#{friends} or id=#{friends} and friend=#{id}
select m.*, a.adddate from member m, addfriends a where a.friends=#{id} and m.id=a.id;

select * from (select rownum rnum, temp.* from (select m.*, a.adddate, h.visit from member m, addfriends a, homepage h where a.friends=#{id} and m.id=a.id and m.id=h.id order by a.id asc) temp)temp2 where temp2.rnum>=#{start} and temp2.rnum<=#{end}

select * from (select rownum rnum, temp.* from (select m.*, a.adddate, h.visit from member m, addfriends a, homepage h where a.friends=#{id} and m.id=a.id and m.id=h.id order by h.visit desc) temp)temp2 where temp2.rnum>=#{start} and temp2.rnum<=#{end}

select * from (select rownum rnum, temp.* from (select m.*, a.adddate, h.visit from member m, addfriends a, homepage h where a.friends=#{id} and m.id=a.id and m.id=h.id order by a.ADDDATE desc) temp)temp2 where temp2.rnum>=#{start} and temp2.rnum<=#{end}
select a.*, m.id from addfriends a, (select id from member where name=#{name}) m where a.id=#{id} and a.friends=m.id or a.id=m.id and a.friends=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from addfriends where id=#{id} and friends=(select id from member where name=#{name}) or id=(select id from member where name=#{name}) and friends=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into friends values(#{id}, (select id from member where name=#{name}), (select nickname from member where name=#{name}), 0)
insert into friends values((select id from member where name=#{name}), #{id}, (select nickname from member where id=#{id}), 0)
